name: Pulstar
overview: NEO GEO's long-awaited, full-scale shoot 'em up is here! Unending, shockingly breathtaking graphics! Master the many items for strategic attacks! 2256 A.D. Alien forces swept into the solar system and this fighting had spread throughout the system in two years. An elite group force, codename: PULSTAR, remains. Earth's final hope. • Take items to snap on powerful options • Break your enemies with various arsenals Warp into Galactic Shooting Excitement with NEO GEO! Released in both North America and Japan.
